abilities.name: Death Mask of Sanguinius
abilities.rule: At the start of the Fight phase, each enemy unit within 6" of this model must take a Battle-shock test, subtracting 1 from that test when they do.

abilities.name: Warden of the Imperium Nihilus
abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit and each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.
